title: smartphones
description: A mobile phone that performs many of the functions of a computer, typically having a touchscreen interface, internet access, and an operating system capable of running downloaded apps.

title: laptops
description: A portable computer that is small and light enough to be used on your lap. It typically has a clamshell form factor, with a keyboard and a screen hinged together.

title: fragrances
description: Perfumes or colognes that emit a pleasant scent, often used for personal grooming and enhancing one's overall presence.

title: skincare
description: Products and routines designed to take care of the skin, improve its appearance, and promote overall skin health.

title: groceries
description: Food and other consumable items that are regularly purchased for household use.

title: home-decoration
description: Items and accessories used to enhance the aesthetics of a home, including furniture, decor, and other decorative elements.
